roles.name: System
roles.description: MOVA runtime and infrastructure components acting on behalf of the platform.

roles.name: Template Author
roles.description: Person or team designing MOVA schemas and envelopes.

roles.name: Operator
roles.description: Person responsible for operating MOVA runtimes and monitoring executions.

roles.name: End User
roles.description: Final human user who triggers workflows and provides input data.

roles.name: Service Integration
roles.description: External or internal service acting as a technical actor in workflows.

resources.name: Default MOVA Runtime
resources.description: Abstract entrypoint representing the default MOVA execution environment.

resources.name: Default Queue
resources.description: Abstract queue for background and asynchronous tasks.

resources.name: Default Storage Bucket
resources.description: Abstract storage for persisted workflow data and attachments.

resources.name: Default Outbound HTTP
resources.description: Abstract outbound HTTP capability used by http_fetch-like verbs.

dataSchemas.name: MOVA Envelope Core 3.6.0
dataSchemas.description: Core JSON Schema describing MOVA envelopes; registered here to allow tools to treat envelopes as data.

dataSchemas.name: MOVA Global Catalog Core 3.6.0
dataSchemas.description: Core JSON Schema describing the MOVA global catalog.

dataSchemas.name: MOVA Meta-Model 1.0.0
dataSchemas.description: Meta-level schema defining MOVA artifact kinds and identifier prefixes.

states.name: Draft
states.description: Initial editable state before any formal submission.

states.name: Pending
states.description: Waiting for processing, decision or external action.

states.name: Active
states.description: Workflow or entity is currently in progress or in use.

states.name: Completed
states.description: Workflow or entity has successfully reached its intended end state.

states.name: Failed
states.description: Workflow or entity ended with an unrecoverable error.

states.name: Cancelled
states.description: Workflow or entity was explicitly stopped before completion.

domains.description: Suggested high-level domains for template sets. This core catalog itself stays domain-agnostic.

notes.description: This is the minimal, domain-neutral global catalog. Domain packs (social, ecommerce, logistics, etc.) should extend it rather than replace it.
